sentences.sentence: An annual grass (Panicum milaiceum) cultivated in Eurasia for its grains and in North America for hay.
sentences.translation: 在欧亚广泛栽培以收获其谷物，在北美洲种植以获取桔杆的一年生植物（稷稷属）
